mapper.sql: e.Emp_Id, e.JobNumber, e.Emp_Name, e.UserImg, e.IndividualImg, e.Emp_Sex, e.Emp_Phone, e.E_mail, e.Birthday, e.Remarks, e.Address, e.WorkersState, e.`Password`, e.LoginState, e.Education, e.Graduate, e.AddName, e.AddTime, e.UpdateName, e.UpdateTime, e.SeparationName, e.SeparationTime, e.SeparationDate, e.Position_Id, e.Dept_Id, e.Enterprise_Id
mapper.select:
select
from emp e where JobNumber = #{jobnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LoginState=0

select ,d.Dept_Name,en.Enterprise_Name,p.Position_Name from emp e inner join dept d on d.Dept_Id=e.Dept_Id inner join enterprise en on en.Enterprise_Id=e.Enterprise_Id inner join `position` p on p.Position_Id=e.Position_Id

select ,d.Dept_Name,en.Enterprise_Name,p.Position_Name from emp e inner join dept d on d.Dept_Id=e.Dept_Id inner join enterprise en on en.Enterprise_Id=e.Enterprise_Id inner join `position` p on p.Position_Id=e.Position_Id where e.WorkersState=0
mapper.insert: insert into emp (JobNumber, Emp_Name, UserImg, IndividualImg, Emp_Sex, Emp_Phone, E_mail, Birthday, Remarks, Address, Education, Graduate, AddName, UpdateName, UpdateTime, SeparationName, SeparationTime, SeparationDate, Position_Id, Dept_Id, Enterprise_Id) values (#{jobnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{individualimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{separationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{separationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{separationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update emp
JobNumber = #{jobnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Emp_Name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserImg = #{userimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IndividualImg = #{individualimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Emp_Sex = #{empSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Emp_Phone = #{empPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E_mail = #{eMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WorkersState = #{workersstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`Password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LoginState = #{loginstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Graduate = #{graduate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddName = #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SeparationName = #{separationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SeparationTime = #{separationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SeparationDate = #{separationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Position_Id = #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Dept_Id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Enterprise_Id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Emp_Id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update emp set WorkersState = #{workersstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LoginState = #{loginstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SeparationName = #{separationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SeparationTime = #{separationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SeparationDate = #{separationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, where Emp_Id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
